item.title: Code Generation
item.description: REAL: source tree: Layer DSL component Extendable component Immutable component Client client-viewmodel P base/P.java view V V.java base/AbstractV.java form F F.java base/AbstractF.java menu M M.java Shared labelSet L L.java L.properties valueType T T.java base/AbstractT.java entity E base/EMeta.java viewmodel V base/VApi.

item.title: Tooling
item.description: Structure and consistency for large code bases Business Concepts reflected in Code Guaranteed valid Domain Model Enforce NULL-safety (“the worst mistake in computer science”) Tooling consist: of a Domain Specific Language (DSL) for defining the domain-model, menus, forms and services an Eclipse IDE (Develop Environment) plugin for supporting the DSL’s and code-generation a set of libraries (required in development and operational) Eclipse Plugin Enforce NULL-safety “I call it [NULL] my billion-dollar mistake” (Tony Hoare, inventor of ALGOL W)
